ThingDef.label: protein wall scaffold
ThingDef.description: A scaffold to guide the growth of a living ship. The shipheart will consume nutrition to convert scaffold to shipflesh.

ThingDef.label: unpowered protein wall scaffold
ThingDef.description: A scaffold to guide the growth of a living ship. The shipheart will consume nutrition to convert scaffold to shipflesh. Does not include conduits for power or coolant.

ThingDef.label: armor scaffold
ThingDef.description: A scaffold to guide the growth of a living ship. The shipheart will consume nutrition to convert scaffold to armor.

ThingDef.Name: ScaffoldCorner
ThingDef.description: A scaffold to guide the growth of a living ship. The shipheart will consume nutrition to convert scaffold to shipflesh.

ThingDef.label: floor scaffold
ThingDef.description: Grows into shipflesh floors when connected to a well fed heart.

ThingDef.label: bioship sphintcer scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold to grow a sphincter.

ThingDef.label: small bioengine scaffold
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel-powered organic engine capable of launching a ship into orbit. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.

ThingDef.label: rcs bioengine scaffold
ThingDef.description: A small thruster that is required to reposition ships. One is required for every 2000 weight.

ThingDef.label: medium engine scaffold
ThingDef.description: A chemfuel-powered engine capable of launching a ship into orbit. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.\n\nIn combat, provides double the speed of smaller engines at the cost of double fuel consumption.

ThingDef.label: large bioengine scaffold
ThingDef.description: A nuclear-powered engine capable of launching a ship into orbit, at the cost of irradiating the surrounding area. Not suitable for interplanetary travel.\n\nProvides six times the speed of small engines.

ThingDef.label: sensor scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for an organic sensor array.

ThingDef.label: small ship maw scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for an small shipmaw.

ThingDef.label: corpse maw scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for an small shipmaw.

ThingDef.label: small weapon scaffold
ThingDef.description: A scaffold from a which small weapon turret will grow.

ThingDef.label: medium weapon scaffold
ThingDef.description: The scaffold from which a medium turret will grow.

ThingDef.label: large weapon scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for a large weapon organ.

ThingDef.label: spinal weapon root scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for the primary attachment point of a bioship spinal weapon.

ThingDef.label: spinal coil scaffold
ThingDef.description: A middle segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Attach one or more of these to a root, then add a barrel to complete the gun.\n\nIncreases base damage by 25%, but also increases power consumption and heat generated by the same percentage.

ThingDef.label: spinal weapon scaffold
ThingDef.description: The final segment of a spinal-mount weapon. Should be placed outside the ship, unless you want a new hole in your hull.

ThingDef.label: small fat store scaffold
ThingDef.description: Base for the growth a fat deposite.

ThingDef.label: large fat store scaffold
ThingDef.description: Base for the growth a fat deposite.

ThingDef.label: psi shield scaffold
ThingDef.description: The heart will convert this to a shield ganglia.

ThingDef.label: vent scaffold
ThingDef.description: The heart will convert this into an internal thermoregulatory vent.

ThingDef.label: small heatsink scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for a bio heatsink

ThingDef.label: large heatsink scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for a large bio heatsink

ThingDef.label: small coolant cyst scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for a coolant cyst.

ThingDef.label: large coolant cyst scaffold
ThingDef.description: Scaffold for collant cyst

ThingDef.label: thermal bile purge duct scaffold
ThingDef.description: The heart will grow this into a thermal bile purge duct.

ThingDef.label: large thermal bile purge duct scaffold
ThingDef.description: The heart will grow this into a thermal bile purge duct.

ThingDef.label: giant mitochondria scaffold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a giant mitochondira, the powerhouse of the beast.

ThingDef.label: colossal mitochondria scaffold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a collosal mitochondira, the powerhouse of the beast.

ThingDef.label: biocapacitor
ThingDef.description: Grows into a biocapacitor that can store 1000 w/d of energy.

ThingDef.label: salvage maw scaffold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a salvage maw that can consume wrecks for nutrition.

ThingDef.label: haul beast eggsac scaffold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a cyst in which a haulbeast will gestate.

ThingDef.label: haul beast eggsac cluster scafold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a cyst cluster in which three haulbeasts will gestate.

ThingDef.label: war beast eggsac scafold
ThingDef.description: Grows into a cyst in which a war beast will gestate.
